meanings.definition: To address with some form of salutation; welcome.
meanings.sent1: She greets her friends with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the teacher greets the students at the door.
meanings.sent3: The cat greets the new puppy with a playful paw swipe.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun greets the sleepy town with its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: The cheerful song of the birds greets the dawn.

meanings.sent1: He greets his guests at the entrance of the party.
meanings.sent2: The train station greets travelers from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected rain greets the outdoor wedding ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The ocean greets the shore with crashing waves.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak greets climbers with a breathtaking view.

meanings.definition: To acknowledge with a gesture of respect or courtesy.
meanings.sent1: The knight greets the queen with a bow.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, people greet each other by bowing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child greets his teacher with a prank.
meanings.sent4: The old tree greets visitors with its outstretched branches.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze greets the flowers with a soft caress.
